node.detail_zh: 患者為印尼籍外傭，7 月中至月底居於長興大廈 2 樓，8 月 1 日到新僱主位於鑽石山鳳德邨住所。長興大廈 2 樓與 9 樓屬同一負責人管理。
node.detail_en: The patient is an Indonesian foreign domestic helper. She had stayed in the 2nd floor dormitory/boarding house in Cheong Hing Mansion, Mong Kok from mid July to the end of July. On Aug 1, she moved into her new employer's residence in Fung Tak Estate, Diamond Hill. The dormitories on the 2nd and 9th floors of Cheong Hing Mansion are managed by the same person.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_zh: 長興大廈 2 樓及 9 樓外傭宿舍
groups.name_en: Cheong Hing Mansion Boarding Houses for Domestic Helpers
groups.description_zh: 屬同一負責人位於長興大廈 2 樓及 9 樓的宿舍，有曾入住印傭及負責人的家人先後確診。
groups.description_en: The two boarding houses for domestic helpers on 2/F and 9/F, Cheong Hing Mansion are both managed by the same person. Confirmed cases include Indonesian domestic helpers who resided there and family members of the boarding houses manager.

node.location_en: Chu Fung House, Fung Tak Estate
